summary: LuidCorporation client management and admin dashboard system with access logging, database backup, enhanced UX/validation, and premium visual identity
architectural_notes: System uses existing database integration for client management
Support chat functionality already implemented and operational

existing_features.title: Create an 'Activity Logs' section in the Admin Panel that displays access logs with Client ID, timestamp (date and time), and source IP address for monitoring client logins in real-time
Add an 'Export Database' button in the Admin Panel that generates and downloads a JSON or CSV file containing all registered client IDs, IP addresses, and passwords for backup purposes

Display a styled red error alert (Toast or Modal) on the client login page when an invalid or non-existent Client ID is entered, with the message: '⚠️ ID not identified. Please check your contract or contact our support team.'
Add a green neon loading effect to the client login page that appears when the 'Enter' button is clicked, providing visual feedback during authentication processing
Add copy buttons (clipboard icon) next to the IP address, username, and password fields in the Client Dashboard that copy the value to clipboard and display a 'Copied!' confirmation message
Add footer links for 'Terms of Use' and 'Privacy Policy' in the Client Dashboard footer with placeholder generic text content that can be edited later
Apply a green glow effect to information cards throughout the application for a premium visual appearance
Add a green indicator dot to the Support Chat widget showing 'High Availability' operational status

new_feature_requests.summary: Access logs section in Master Panel showing client ID, timestamp, and IP address
Database export button in admin panel to generate JSON/CSV backup of all IDs, IPs, and passwords
Login validation with styled error alerts for invalid IDs and green neon loading effect
Copy buttons for IP/username/password in client dashboard with confirmation message
Footer links for Terms of Use and Privacy Policy in client dashboard
Green glow effect on information cards and green indicator on support chat showing high availability
